## `r title` {.tabset}

### Distribution
```{r, fig.height=6, fig.cap = distribution_caption}
if (!is_categorical) {
  bar_gap <- 0
  plot_df <- meta_data %>%
    mutate(
      bin = cut_interval(!!as.name(meta_var), n = 15)
    )
} else {
  bar_gap <- NA
  plot_df <- meta_data %>%
    mutate(
      bin = !!as.name(meta_var)
    )
}

plot_df <- plot_df %>%
  mutate(
    timeframe = ifelse(
      year == params$year,
      year,
      paste0("Pre-", params$year)
    )
  ) %>%
  group_by(timeframe, bin) %>%
  arrange(!!meta_var) %>%
  summarise(
    count = n(),
    extra_info = ifelse(
      is_categorical,
      "",
      paste0(" (", !!as.name(meta_var), ")")
    ),
    books = paste(
      paste0(book, extra_info),
      collapse = "<br>"
    )
  )

if (!is_categorical) {
  levels(plot_df$bin) <- stringr::str_replace(
    levels(plot_df$bin),
    "[\\(\\[](.*),(.*)\\]",
    "\\1-\\2"
  )
}

plot_df %>%
  plot_ly(alpha = 0.6) %>%
  add_bars(
    hovertext = ~books,
    color = ~timeframe,
    colors = c("#7570b3", "#d95f02"),
    x = ~bin,
    y = ~count,
    hovertemplate = paste(
      "<b>%{y} Book(s):</b>",
      "%{hovertext}<extra></extra>",
      sep = "<br>"
    )
  ) %>%
  layout(
    barmode = "stack",
    bargap = bar_gap,
    xaxis = list(
      title = list(text = "")
    ),
    yaxis = list(
      title = list(text = ""),
      showticklabels = FALSE
    )
  ) %>%
  config(displayModeBar = FALSE)
```
